summary: The IP6 class models an IPv6 packet header, encapsulating fields such as version, traffic class, flow label, payload length, next header, hop limit, and source/destination addresses. It provides standard string representation and helper utilities for containment checks, along with property accessors and mutators for each header component.
business_intent: Enable creation, parsing, and manipulation of IPv6 headers within networking software, facilitating packet construction, inspection, and protocol handling.
